reviews.text: It's a nice and clean train station. There's an inside waiting area, a covered area and a toilet.
Surely,  I would say this is a great place. I was careful at the huge step onto the platform. Apart from that it's a great station even if it's not that busy as you may know as you go there
Staff have always been helpful to me - well done guys.
Wonderful kind guy in the ticket booth today sat 10 Feb 1pm printed out my train return times for me without me even asking.thankyou 👍

A pleasant little station, served by half hourly service on a Sunday and every 15 minutes Monday to Saturday to Southport and Hunts Cross, which is OK for a local rail service. Train station seemed well maintained and well presented. I did notice that the disabled toilet was out of order, although good to know they have one when it is working.
